it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher, Observer<VCEvent>, VCEventDispatcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDeathController, CardController, MatchController, MatchMakingController, SetUpController, TurnController

    public abstract class Controller
extends Object
implements Observer<VCEvent>, VCEventDispatcher
    This class is extended by all the controllers used in the Server. It implements Observer in order to receive and dispatch correctly the events arriving from the view.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        disables a controller without deleting it in order to avoid concurrent modification exceptions.

      • getRoomNumber

        public int getRoomNumber()

      • enoughActivePlayers

        public boolean enoughActivePlayers()
        calculates whether a match has enough active players.
        Returns:
        if the match has enough active players to keep running, it returns true.

      • getNextActiveUser

        public String getNextActiveUser(String user)
        calculates the next active user in the game.
        Parameters:
        user - the currently playing user.
        Returns:
        the next active user in the turn.

      • disablePowerUps

        protected void disablePowerUps(String currentPlayer,
                               String constraint)
        checks whether power ups that cannot be used are present and, in case they are, it notifies the view in order to deactivate them
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player playing.
        constraint - the constraint of the power up (eg: during the turn, while being attacked, ...).

      • stringToAmmo

        protected AmmoColour stringToAmmo(String ammoName)
        generates an ammo colour from the name string.
        Parameters:
        ammoName - the name of the colour of the ammo.
        Returns:
        the ammo colour.
